text: Serena Lo Bue (born 4 August 1995) is an Italian lightweight rower. She competes with her sister Giorgia in the lightweight pair event, and at the 2018 World Rowing Championships in Plovdiv, Bulgaria, they became world champions. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female rowers Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Italy
title: Serena Lo Bue
